FMJS

A Collection of tiny helpers. "Functions by Matooy for JavaScript"

All functions is contained specific namespaces.

  • vr. variable
  • ob. object
  • ar. array
  • st. string
  • fn. function
  • event. Event create/bind/unbind/trigger
  • dom. DOM query/manipulation
  • html. HTML string manipulation
  • date. Date object wrapper
  • time. Time-based helpers
  • math. *reserved Math
  • regexp. regular expression
  • file. File reader
⊞
